articles.title: Rapper Hurricane Chris charged with second-degree murder in Louisiana - CNN
articles.description: Hurricane Chris, who rose to fame in the late 2000s, is facing murder charges after a man was fatally shot in Shreveport, Louisiana, Friday. The rapper claimed self-defense, but he surveillance video showed otherwise, police said.

articles.title: AMC Changes Its Mind and Says It Will Require Moviegoers to Wear Face Masks - Gizmodo
articles.description: After facing customer backlash, AMC has decided to require all moviegoers to wear face masks in its theaters, regardless of whether the region or city they live in requires them. The company originally only strongly encouraged their use.
